songs.lyrics:
Lately I've been ??? awake thinking, wishing, dreaming about you
???? as my eyes away, I can feel you with me, It's true
Make mistakes once or twice
But we still burning bright
Baby you're all that I need tonight
Everything, seas & places, son every worlroad I go
Don't know why ???????
????????
Know wanna be with you
Oh I, I just wanna be with you
Oh I, I just wanna be with you
Oh I, I just wanna be with you
Oh I, I just wanna be with you

Tell me that you'll miss me baby
Tell me everything's on your mind
songs.title: Be With You (Unreleased)
